text: Koly chutka shcho vplyvaye na bezpeku prybuvaye yikhniy shlyakh, vony rozpovsyudzhuyutʹ tse. Vony vidpravyly tse do kur'yera, ta tsʹoho u vydatku sered nykh, tsey khto rozumiyutʹ tsi materialy by poinformuvav yikh. Yakshcho b tse bulo ne dlya BOZHOYI charivnosti do vas, ta Yoho myloserdya, vy by proslidkuvaly za chortom, krim nechyslennoho
